Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 21 Sārammaṇaduka
21.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Sārammaṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
24.
81Sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
82Anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
83Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
84Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  aññamaññe cha…pe…  purejāte āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
